entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
